casebody.data:
Second Department,

May, 1947.

(May 1, 1947.) In the Matter of a Plan of Readjustment of the Rights of the Holders of Investments in Mortgages Covering 2729 Hubbard Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Guaranteed by Bond and Mortgage Guarantee Company. (Guarantee No. 150,386.) In the Matter of Brooklyn Trust Company, as Trustee under a Declaration of Trust, Dated September 22, 1936, for the Consideration of an Offer for the Purchase of the Bonds and Mortgages Comprising the Principal Assets of the Trust Estate, Respondent. (Plan No. 1679.) Sophie Rabinowitz, Appellant.

Order, on reargument, approving application of respondent, as trustee, for permission to sell and assign certain mortgages, affirmed, without costs. No opinion. Carswell, Acting P. J., Johnston, Adel, Nolan and Sneed, JJ., concur. [See post, p. 909,] ,
